page.title: 05Battery Hens By E.Hinxman
page.content: Mr Jones is one of the largest land owners in our area.He has 2 chicken houses on his farm with 10,000 chickens in each of them.He buys day old chicks and sells them at 49 days old to "Chuckie Chicken"for freezing. Some of the hens are kept for egg production.The battery hens are kept inside.Two women are employed to feed them,clean them out and make sure they are healthy they also collect the eggs.I do not agree with battery hens because it is not natural,all they do is lay eggs and get fattened up to be sold,killed and eaten.I prefer the free range method as it is more natural for the hens to live outside, they are healthier and I think it is kinder.
